markdownRemark.html:
Web Design Insipration

Some Websites from where you can get inspirations / ideas that can help you design your own website.

  • Awwwards
  • Dribbble
  • Frontend Mentor
  • One Page Love
  • Site Inspire
  • Code My UI

Fonts and Typography

  • Google Fonts
  • Font Squirrel
  • Typo Guide
  • Type Tester

CSS Resources

  • CSS3 Reference MDN
  • Animate.css
  • Can I Use
  • Clippy
  • CSS3 Patterns Gallery
  • Responsive Grid System

JavaScript Resources

  • JS Reference MDN
  • JS Keycodes
  • ES6 Browser Compatibility Table

Images and Video

A list of free resources to get images, illustrations and Videos that you can include in your website.

Images

  • Pixabay
  • Unsplash
  • The Stocks
  • ISO Republic
  • Subtle Patterns

Illustrations

  • UnDraw
  • Open Doodles
  • Fresh Folk
  • Glaze
  • Free illustrations

Videos

  • Coverr
  • Videvo
  • Pixabay

Others

  • Epidemic Sound
  • Canva
  • Randowm User Generator
  • Place It

ICONS

  • Font Awesome
  • Ion Icons
  • Flaticon
  • Icons 8
  • Fontastic

Color Tools

Tools that can help you choose colors for your website

  • Material UI
  • Material Palette
  • Flat UI Colors
  • Color Hunt
  • UI Gradients
  • 0 to 255
  • Paletton

Tools for Optimization

Different tools that could be used so as to optimize your website and increase its performance.

  • Reduce Image Size
  • Google Page Speed
  • Google Mobile Friendly Test
  • Google Analytics
  • HTML Validator
  • CSS Validator
  • Favicon Generator
